description: This is a main entry point for a Flutter application. It sets up the main widget tree, including a MyApp class that initializes MaterialApp with theme settings and a home page. The home page, MyHomePage, is a StatefulWidget that displays a simple scaffold with an AppBar and centered content indicating that the frontend is being generated.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Main application widget that sets up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen of the app, with a title parameter.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the state of MyHomePage, builds the scaffold UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; runs the MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method in MyApp and _MyHomePageState that returns the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
